user_query: I'm organizing a conference and I want to share the event agenda with attendees via SMS. Can you generate a short URL for the agenda and provide me with some random messages related to business?

TaskList.description: Generate a short URL for the conference agenda that can be shared with attendees.
Fetch random business-related messages that can be included with the SMS notifications.
Send SMS notifications to all attendees with the generated short URL and random business messages.
